data.title: Cumberland Times News
data.meta_description: Daniel Ryan passed away. This is the full obituary where you can share condolences and memories. Published in the Cumberland Times News on 2024-07-12.
data.text:
Daniel Edward Ryan, 41, of Carpendale, W.Va., was welcomed into the gates of Heaven on Tuesday, July 9th, 2024.

Born on Nov. 11, 1982, in Olney, Md., he was the son of Rodney and Teri (Shrader) Ryan. He was preceded in death by his son, Jasher D. Ryan.

Daniel was a hard working truck driver at Eby's Sawmill. Dan was also well trained in many areas of tactics and was proud to be a part of his family business, Storm Mountain Training Center. He was full of life and his smile was contagious. He loved camping, reading all things history and smoking his pipe in his rocking chair! He was an avid Capital's fan. Dan loved his wife and children and spent most of his free time making memories with them! He was a God fearing Christian and a talented musician. Dan loved to laugh and crack jokes. He had dreams of becoming a history teacher one day. He was a strong, incredible man and he will be missed dearly by his family and friends.

Left to cherish in his memory in addition to his parents are his loving wife, Bryanna (Gray) Ryan; his sons, Gabriel Ryan, Elijah Ryan, Adam Ryan and Liam Ryan; grandmother, Judith Shrader of Monroe, N.C.; his brother, Jacob Ryan and wife Tiffanie of Elk Garden, W.Va.; and sisters, Christie Ryan of Elk Garden, W.Va. and Jennifer Amtower and husband Andrew from New Creek, W.Va. He is also survived by many nieces and nephews.

A Celebration of Daniel's Life will be announced at a later date.

Arrangements have been entrusted to the Markwood Funeral Home, Keyser.

Condolences may be left for the family after Daniel's obituary at: www.markwoodfuneralhome.com.
